fluids.notes: RWD models only. AWD/330xi: see separate entry. With filter change. BMW LL-01 approved oils include Castrol Edge 0W-30, Mobil 1 0W-40, Pennzoil Platinum Euro 0W-40. Factory interval is 15,000 mi; 7,500 mi is a common conservative recommendation.
AWD models require 1 liter more than RWD due to oil pan design. With filter change.

fluids.specification: BMW Blue Coolant (G48) 50/50 with distilled water
fluids.notes: Total system capacity per Bentley manual. Use distilled water only. Phosphate/nitrate-free ethylene glycol antifreeze.
Fill until fluid runs from fill hole. Earlier 330i models may have 5-speed Getrag (1.0L) or ZF (1.2L). Original factory fill was MTF-LT-1.
Pre-facelift 330i (to ~03/2003). Drain & fill capacity per Bentley manual. ZF considers this a lifetime fill, but periodic service extends life. Check level at 38°C via fill plug.
Facelift 330i (from ~03/2003) and all 330xi. Do NOT use ZF fluid in GM transmission — different specifications.
Fill until fluid runs from fill hole. AWD rear diff: 1.0 liter. See separate entries for AWD front diff and transfer case.

fluids.specification: SAE 75W-140 synthetic with LSD friction modifier

fluids.capacity: 0.24 liters new fill / 0.16 liters oil change
fluids.notes: Per Bentley manual. Very small capacity — use a measured syringe for accuracy.

fluids.capacity: 0.7 liters (0.74 US quarts) fill / 0.6 liters (0.63 US quarts) refill
fluids.notes: Fill until fluid runs from fill hole. Per Bentley manual.

fluids.specification: ATF Dexron III (factory fill for most USA-market E46)
fluids.interval: As needed (permanently sealed system, no drain plug)
fluids.notes: Some cold-climate market vehicles use Pentosin CHF 11S (green). Check existing fluid color: red = ATF, green = CHF 11S. Never mix the two types.
Flush entire system. Hygroscopic — absorbs moisture over time. Use only new fluid from unopened containers.
Shares reservoir with brake system on E46
Premium required for optimal performance. European RON 98 (Super Plus) preferred where available.

fluids.specification: BMW washer concentrate or -30°F rated fluid
fluids.capacity: 5.5 liters with headlight washers / 3.5 liters without
fluids.notes: Capacity depends on whether headlight washer system is equipped
PAG oil type and quantity varies by compressor — check underhood sticker. Check for leaks before recharging.
Sealed bearings — no serviceable grease interval
